text: phir unake apane vachan bhang karane aur allaah kee aayaton ka inakaar karane ke kaaran aur nabiyon ko naahaq qatl karane aur unake yah kahane ke kaaran ki "hamaare hrday aavaranon mein surakshit hai" - nahin, balki vaastav mein unake inakaar ke kaaran allaah ne unake dilon par thappa laga diya hai. to ye eemaan thode hee laate hai
